query.main: select distinct a0.recid as notices_id from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! as a0, entrepot_source_!!current_source!! as a1, notices where notice_id='!!p!!' and a0.ufield='461' and a0.usubfield='t' and a0.value=tit1 and a1.ufield='bl' and a1.value in ('s','a') group by a0.ref

select distinct e1.recid as notice_id, e1.i_value from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! as e1 join entrepot_source_!!current_source!! as e2 on e1.recid=e2.recid where (e1.i_value like ' %!!p!!% ') and (e1.ufield='461' and e1.usubfield in ('v')) and (e2.value='b' and e2.ufield='bl') group by e1.ref
